SEARCH
Package org.douggschwind.games.chess.moves

Class CastlingMove

java.lang.Object
org.douggschwind.games.chess.moves.CastlingMove
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChessMove
public class CastlingMove extends Object implements ChessMove
Instances of this class represent a Castling move, where two pieces actually move at once, the Rook and the King. It can be a "Queen side" move where the King moves two spaces to the left, or a King side move where the King moves two spaces to the right. The Rook then moves to the space on the other side of the King from where it was previously.
